definition: the act of moving back and forth, wink briefly
details:
noun
- the act of moving back and forth
= synonyms: flicker, waver
- the motion made by flapping up and down
= synonyms: flap, flapping, fluttering
- a disorderly outburst or tumult
= synonyms: disturbance, disruption, commotion, hurly burly, to-do, hoo-ha, hoo-hah, kerfuffle
- abnormally rapid beating of the auricles of the heart (especially in a regular rhythm)
verb
- wink briefly
= synonyms: bat
- move back and forth very rapidly
= synonyms: flicker, quiver, waver, flitter
- beat rapidly
= synonyms: palpitate
- move along rapidly and lightly
= synonyms: flit
- flap the wings rapidly or fly with flapping movements
= example: flap the wings rapidly or fly with flapping movements
